rank: Rank must be a string and is required.
actionCount: Action count must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
rankId: Rank ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
actionCountFrom: Action count from must be a non-negative integer.
actionCountTo: Action count to must be a non-negative integer.
startDate: Start date must be a valid ISO 8601 date.
endDate: End date must be a valid ISO 8601 date.
